fields.name: ts
fields.comment: The source TypeScript file, relative to the directory of the config file. File ext can be neglected.

fields.name: bin
fields.comment: The output file name after bundling, relative to the directory of the config file. File ext can be neglectd. A JS file and an HTML file are expected to be generated.

fields.name: extraAssets
fields.comment: Extra asset files that need to be copied to and served from a new directory, such as favicon.ico. Asset files that are imported by entry files don't need to be included here.
